CustomField.description: Determines if a subscription is renewed when the subscription end date is reached. This field is carried over from the Is_Subscription_Auto_Renewal field on the Product when the original order is placed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines if a subscription is renewed when the subscription end date is reached. This field is carried over from the Is_Subscription_Auto_Renewal field on the Product when the original order is placed.
CustomField.label: Subscription Auto Renewal
